return.name: dimensions
return.description: Returns the number of dimensions in the array.

page.description: Get the number of dimensions in an array, such as for a multidimensional array.
page.example:
dim arrmd[4,4] as n
? arrmd.dimensions() = 2
for i = 1 to 4 arrmd[i,i] = 1 next
? arrmd[1,1] = 1
? arrmd[2,1] = 0
? arrmd[2,2] = 1
